snippet: The accelerating rate of climate change poses a severe risk to national security and acts as a catalyst for global political conflict, a report published Tuesday said.
abstract: Report from CNA Corporation Military Advisory Board says accelerating rate of climate change poses a severe risk to national security and acts as a catalyst for global political conflict.
lead_paragraph: The accelerating rate of climate change poses a severe risk to national security and acts as a catalyst for global political conflict, a report published Tuesday said.

headline.main: Climate Change Deemed Growing Security Threat by Military Researchers
headline.print_headline: Climate Change Deemed Growing Security Threat by Military Researchers
